meanings.definition: To shape or form something by using a post or mold.
meanings.sent1: She postforms the clay into beautiful shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist postforms the sculpture with precision.
meanings.sent3: The potter postforms the clay into a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Her hands postform the dough into delicate pastries.
meanings.sent5: He postforms the metal into intricate designs.

meanings.definition: A form or structure made by using a post or mold.
meanings.sent1: The postforms of the columns add elegance to the building.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter created intricate postforms for the project.
meanings.sent3: The cake had unique postforms that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The postforms of the ice cubes resembled tiny sculptures.
meanings.sent5: The artist displayed various postforms in the exhibition.
